entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:35 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
